Read Last Contact in Book Order

Description of Book Order

Book order is designed to highlight specific themes throughout the story, but jumps back and forth though time. It is written in multiple acts. Each act highlights a specific theme about the story.

Back to Top ↑

Act 00: The Prologue

Dedication - November 2306 CE

Synopsis: Tim Li, the President of Humanity, consults with his closest advisors before one of the most important speeches of his career.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Allorien

Link to chapter: Act: 00 - Dedication

Acknowledgment - November 2306 CE

The Three - December 2274, February 2276, and June 2278

Mission - July 2278
